video.title: Girlfriends' Guide to Divorce
video.synopsis: After the world learns the truth about her failing marriage, a successful self-help author tries to salvage her career and find her way as a divorcée.

episodes.synopsis: Famous author Abby has been living a lie about the end of her marriage, but finally jump-starts a new life with some advice from divorced friends.
episodes.title: Rule #23: Never to Lie to the Kids

episodes.synopsis: Abby and Jake agree to a "good divorce" for the sake of the kids, while she tries to salvage her "Girlfriends' Guide" brand after a public breakdown.
episodes.title: Rule #174: Never Trust Anyone Who Charges By the Hour

episodes.synopsis: Abby's plans for her first night alone without the kids do not unfold as expected. Jake tries to make the kids' first night at his new place perfect.
episodes.title: Rule #47: Always Take Advantage of ‘Me’ Time

episodes.synopsis: Abby dates Nate, a married dad with whom she had an emotional affair during her marriage. Max and Ford receive an award from an LGBT group.
episodes.title: Rule #426: Fantasyland: A Great Place to Visit

episodes.synopsis: After a disastrous date with Nate, Abby goes out with Will, her hot, young pursuer. Lyla's mom visits to help make a good impression on a caseworker.
episodes.title: Rule #21: Leave Childishness to Children

episodes.synopsis: Phoebe's baby-jewelry photo shoot provides an excuse for a trip to Las Vegas, where Abby ponders her next book and unexpectedly encounters a rival.
episodes.title: Rule #33: When in Doubt, Run Away

episodes.synopsis: Secretly wondering if she's pregnant, Abby throws a birthday party for Lilly, only to have Jake's TV actress girlfriend, Becca, show up uninvited.
episodes.title: Rule #67: Don’t Kill the Princess

episodes.synopsis: As Abby prepares to pitch a new brand to her agency, her blunt, outspoken New York friend Jo shows up. Jake directs an episode of Becca's TV series.
episodes.title: Rule #17: Ask the Answer Lady

episodes.synopsis: Abby goes on 10 dates in two days in order to write an article about the experience. Delia fears she will be disbarred if her affair becomes public.
episodes.title: Rule #32: F-You, Rob Frumpkis

episodes.synopsis: The other moms at school are furious when Abby's article threatens to expose one of their husbands as a cheater. Delia discovers a secret about Jo.
episodes.title: Rule #3: Don’t Stand in the Doorway

episodes.synopsis: When the kids spend Thanksgiving with Jake, Abby throws a "Friendsgiving" dinner with new boyfriend Will, but strange things happen around the house.
episodes.title: Rule #46: Keep the Holidays Low Key

episodes.synopsis: Despite the fact that they're finalizing their divorce, Abby and Jake discover that they're getting along better than they have in many years.
episodes.title: Rule #92: Don’t Do the Crime If You Can’t Do the Time

episodes.synopsis: Will wants to celebrate Abby's divorce by taking her to Mexico, but Jake proposes commemorating their breakup in a most unexpected way.
episodes.title: Rule #101: Know When It’s Time to Move On
